commits.message: Add dual payment gateway (Dodo + LemonSqueezy) and fake door validation
commits.author: shalombook

commits.message: Archive and delete duplicate Coming Late Squad from Vapi
commits.author: shalombook

commits.message: Archive and delete 15 old single-assistant scenarios from Vapi
commits.author: shalombook

commits.message: Add orphaned assistants to Vapi archive and delete from account
commits.author: shalombook

commits.message: Add backup of 6 deleted legacy Vapi assistants
commits.author: shalombook

panels.title: Add dual payment gateway
panels.scene: Two massive gates, one labeled 'Dodo' and the other 'LemonSqueezy', now guard the entrance to the kingdom. Villagers are tossing gold coins through both gates. A flimsy, cardboard door labeled 'FAKE' stands slightly off to the side, ignored.

bubbles.speaker: Villager
bubbles.text: Two payment gateways! Our commerce will be unstoppable!

panels.title: Archive and delete Coming Late Squad
panels.scene: A sad, small group of villagers wearing tattered clothes labeled 'Coming Late Squad' are being escorted out of the kingdom by the Knight. Villagers cheer.

bubbles.speaker: Villager
bubbles.text: The Coming Late Squad is GONE! Punctuality reigns!

panels.title: Backup of 6 deleted legacy assistants
panels.scene: A tiny wagon pulled by a donkey carries six ghostly figures labeled 'Legacy Vapi Assistant'. The Knight stands guard with a stern expression. Villagers are throwing flowers at the wagon.

bubbles.speaker: Villager
bubbles.text: Six legacy assistants saved for posterity! Our children will learn their names!

panels.title: 5 commits. 2 squads exiled. 2 payment options added.
panels.scene: The Knight sits wearily on his horse, wiping sweat from his brow. In the background, villagers are erecting a statue of a lemon next to a statue of a dodo. A child is being named 'Archive'.

bubbles.speaker: Villager
bubbles.text: All hail the Knight! He has balanced the realm!
